title: league of legends tm crashes after champ select
body: Ive tried reinstalling my league and deleting folders also retarting my pc multiple times but still does the same thing. Even tried downloading it to a differnt driver. I'd like help to fix it if you can. I tried everything i could youtube, forums etc. Its also after champ select. If you can help me fix this issue. Please and thank you.

replies.body:
If the game keeps crashing right after champion select when you start loading the actual game itself, there might be two different things going on here.

You may not be able to get a secure connection with the game servers which is causing this weird crash for some reason, which you should be able to patch up by checking over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

If that doesn't help, the game itself might actually be corrupted or didn't install correctly. In that case, grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both options **reinstalling and clean uninstall** turned on.
